================
``macro_rules!``
================

The easiest way to get started is with declarative, or "``macro_rules``", macros. (This
concept was borrowed directly from Rust.)

Follow :doc:`the tutorial <tutorial>` for a hands-on introduction, or jump straight into
:doc:`the reference <reference>` for the full run-down.
